title: The Compulsion
description: Lost Child, a magically gifted orphan is abandoned at a monastery as an infant. Exiled after an accident, the unwanted and unnamed child begins a journey throughout her homeland of Algonia, searching for her place in a world where magic is illegal and dragons are extinct. While evading soldiers and the king's dark warlocks, Lost Child finds others, and together, they fight to restore hope and power to the people of Algonia. It is only in the crucial moments of possible defeat that Lost Child truly realizes her heritage and finally understands what she has to offer her people.
author: Leah Randall Vest
